TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHTRUST <SOTR> TO ACQUIRE FOUR BANKS
TEXT.BODY: SouthTrust Corp, a 5.1 billion dlr multibank holding company, said it entered into agreements to acquire four Florida banks with assets totalling more than 233.2 mln dlrs. Terms of the agreements were not disclosed. The four banks are: Central Bank of Volusia County, with assets of 59.3 mln dlrs, Bank of Pensacola with assets of 63.8 mln dlrs, and Vista Bank, which operates Vista Bank of Volusia County with assets of 37.8 mln dlrs and Vista Bank of Marion County with assets of 72.3 mln dlrs. It said the agreements are subject to regulatory approval. Reuter
